roleset.name: make less

role.descr: End point, end state of arg1

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Having two major products would lessen the company's vulnerability to one market's down cycle and help smooth out the flow of cash and earnings.
example.arg: the company's vulnerability to one market's down cycle

example.name: no target for trace
example.text: However, the junk-bond market has collapsed in recent weeks, lessening the likelihood that such a transaction would succeed.
example.arg: the likelihood that such a transaction would succeed
